channel.title: How would i add an item to a shop
channel.description: like.. what code would i look for to add an item in a shop and what folder / files would i look in?

item.title: How would i add an item to a shop
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

Damn epic qoute fail, i read what you said

whogoesthere:

I have a pi… but thanks for the response

uhmm, im not sure what its like in a PI, never coded one up yet…

Read full topic

item.title: How would i add an item to a shop
item.dc:creator: @whogoesthere whogoesthere
item.description:
@whogoesthere wrote:

[quote=“Mikeyzzz, post:5, topic:417554”]uhmm i would be thinking your attempting to add it to a delta, if this is so you will need to do this,

open up shops.cfg in the config folder

then look up the shops name

shop = 5 FoodI have a pi… but thanks for the response

assuming that is your shop after that place the item id and amount.

so im gonna add some lobsters
i will write this

So now i have added 15000 noted lobsters to my shop hope this has helped.

Note: Remember always to spereate anything after the shop number with the Tab key.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: How would i add an item to a shop
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

uhmm i would be thinking your attempting to add it to a delta, if this is so you will need to do this,

open up shops.cfg in the config folder

then look up the shops name

assuming that is your shop after that place the item id and amount.

so im gonna add some lobsters
i will write this

So now i have added 15000 noted lobsters to my shop hope this has helped.

Note: Remember always to spereate anything after the shop number with the Tab key.
